comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: Original Agence Meurisse photo on Gallica site (pub. date 1914) has following caption: "Prisonniers allemands entourant leurs morts aux environs de Reims" [German prisoners burying (?) their dead around Reims] gallica.bnf.fr/ark:/12148/btv1b9042282k

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: artolog: Thanks (again) for the source, date, and original caption here.  We'll include this information next time we update.
